column4: hi i want a vpn for ubuntu with wine because in ubuntu is very very very very difficult to install a vpn client  for me  do you known something vpn for wine in ubuntu, please?
I think Networkmanager itself is able to connect to a VPN
you just have to click some buttons and everything is set
well, I’m sorry, I’ve only tried setting a VPN up looooooong ago. Right now I can’t do anything else than google a good how-to, too ;)
